(Code, you need to follow the RPG a bit better. DeathStorm wasn't even there, 
and half the poeple you fired at were inside the Ark.)

::Zardus::

Zardus looks at a security screen which shows Nemesis in the CR chamber room. 
He turns on the intercom.

"Nemesis, when Wolfgang wakes up, inform me. I have some questions I need 
answered..."
